title: Part 482 - Licensed Gunsmiths Engaged In The Business Of Assembling Or Manufacturing Firearms
content:
Part 482 - Licensed Gunsmiths Engaged In The Business Of Assembling Or Manufacturing Firearms

State Regulations
§ 482.1 - Definitions
§ 482.2 - Procedure for obtaining certificate of compliance
§ 482.3 - Suspension or revocation of certificate of compliance
§ 482.4 - Inspection of records and inventory of gunsmiths licensed to manufacture firearms
§ 482.5 - Specifications as to materials and parts in the manufacturing or assembling of firearms
§ 482.6 - Safety standards tests
§ 482.7 - Effective date

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
